references: Related: CF 271869, CF C20071, CF C20279, Ord 96300
summary: AN ORDINANCE making an appropriation from the Light Fund to settle those certain claims of Tyee Construction Company identified as C-20071 in the amount of $500,000 and amended Claim C-20279 in the amount of $695,060.74, arising out of a contract (Specification 2082) for construction of manholes and power and telephone duct banks from Second Avenue and Seneca Street to Massachusetts Receiving Substation.
